title: European Empires: British, French, Spanish, Portuguese
description: Survey the rise and fall of the European colonial empires, their global impact, and the legacies they left behind.

title: Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment
description: Illuminate the era where science and reason took center stage, giving birth to revolutionary ideas that changed societies forever.

title: Mughal Empire and Early Modern India
description: Relish in the grandeur of the Mughals, their architectural wonders, and the syncretism that characterized early modern India.

title: Qing Dynasty and the end of imperial China
description: Witness the last great dynasty of China, its challenges, innovations, and the tumultuous events leading to the end of the imperial era.

title: Russian Tsardom and Empire
description: Traverse the vast Russian landscape, its tsars, expansion, and the intricate tapestry of its imperial legacy.
